Hero.title: SandCastle
Hero.p1: Sandcastle keeps your revenue from washing away. From first call to paid, every step is visible, enforced, auditable, and in your browser.

About.p1: SandCastle turns overdue invoices into cash fast. In under 90 seconds, it places a voice call, sends a secure payment link, and flips an invoice from Overdue to Paid with a clear, auditable trail.
About.p2: Safety and determinism are built-in: the agent operates with explicit guardrails and an allowed-tools list. Every step is traced and state updates happen via transactional Convex mutationsâ€”no hidden side effects.
About.p3: Under the hood we use Vapi (voice), AgentMail (agent inbox + email), Autumn to create Stripe test-mode payment links, Convex for reactive state, and an MCP gateway to orchestrate tools. The UI surfaces a live tool trace, policy checks, and status changes in real time.

Experience.desc1: Live outbound calls with a tight scripted flow. Barge-in is enabled for natural interruptions. Connects over PSTN or WebRTC and emits call events to the live trace. We surface connect, accept, and hangup as timeline events. The call state drives UI badges and safeguards contact windows.
Experience.desc2: Agent-owned inbox for outbound email and replies. Sends the secure payment link with invoice details. Outbox and status appear in the UI trace. Delivery, open, and reply markers update state so follow-ups stay timely. The email record is captured for audit with redacted addresses.
Experience.desc3: Creates a Stripe test mode payment link for the agreed amount. Returns the link to email and posts a webhook on success. A reconcile button is available if the webhook is slow. The link includes amount, memo, and expiration for clarity. Webhook results are validated before state changes.
Experience.desc4: Single source of truth for invoices and runs. State changes occur through transactional mutations and update the UI in real time. Every transition is stored for audit. Each mutation records who, what, and when with a transaction id. Counters, badges, and reset actions remain consistent after reloads.
Experience.desc5: Registers whitelisted tools and enforces guardrails at runtime. Shapes human readable traces of each tool call and result. Blocks out of policy actions before execution. Every request passes policy checks with clear reasons when blocked. Inputs and outputs are normalized for readable, exportable traces.
